Package com.atakmap.android.cot

Class CotMarkerRefresher

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.atakmap.android.cot.CotMarkerRefresher
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Disposable
    public class CotMarkerRefresher
extends java.lang.Object
implements Disposable
    Listens for self-produced CoT entry MapItems and installs listeners to maintain an send changes
